messages.subject: trying to locate movie title
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/17/02 4:10:26 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/17/02 4:10:26 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Dear Unschoolers: Has anyone seen an Eskimo movie acted and written by
Eskimos? I can't seem to find any web site on it. I heard it was
called "Fast Runner." Has anyone know or seen it? Thank you. Lisa of
MT >>

If you need an Alaska contact for any of your questions, try Heidi (my sis)
at snavley@.... I'm sure she could answer some of your questions or
look for stuff like this when she's out and about.
We had an "Ana Maimie" (Grandma Maimie) that was a little Eskimo lady in our
church who was raised in the traditional ways.
I have the mukluks she gave me as a child still. In her adult life she hunted
from an airplane with her dh, he flew the plane and she was the shooter. Very
interesting life.
She died a few years ago, but I have her life story somewhere (which includes
her Christian conversion to the church that I left some time ago) if I can
find it I'd be happy to copy any interesting parts.

Ren
"Knowledge will not always take the place of simple observation."
~Arnold Lobel
Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
